content: We sent the links a few days ago. I'll send another email to those who registered for virtual participation tomorrow morning right before the session starts.

3 minutes ago @Bartosz Milewski said he registered (at some unspecified time, but let's assume right now) but has not received a Zoom link. Will people like this get Zoom links?

I made the perhaps-mistake of reminding people yesterday that they could register for the conference and watch it on Zoom. So there may continue to be people trying to register.
I just sent a new email with Zoom and Zulip links.
It would be helpful to zoom the room 1215 camera in farther to see the board more clearly for the lens tutorial, if that's possible
